00028 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00029 
00030 //base class
00031 #include "KviCryptEngine.h"
00032 
00033 // class definitions for the libcrypto++ case
00034 #include <cryptopp/aes.h>
00035 #include <cryptopp/blowfish.h>
00036 #include <string>
00037 
00038 // The following two defines are to indicate the in-/output encoding (hex
00039 // or Base64).
00040 #define KVI_RIJNDAEL_HEX 0
00041 #define KVI_RIJNDAEL_B64 1
00042 
00043 // AES/Rijndael
00044 class KviRijndaelEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00045 {
00046         Q_OBJECT
00047 public:
00048         KviRijndaelEngine();
00049         virtual ~KviRijndaelEngine();
00050 protected:
00051         virtual int getKeyLen(){ return CryptoPP::AES::DEFAULT_KEYLENGTH; };
00052         virtual int getEncoding(){ return KVI_RIJNDAEL_HEX; };
00053 private:
00054         std::string m_szEncKey;
00055         std::string m_szDecKey;
00056 public:
00057         virtual bool init(const char * pcEncKey, int iEncKeyLen, const char * pcDecKey, int iDecKeyLen);
00058         virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * pcPlainText, KviCString & szOutBuffer);
00059         virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * pcInBuffer, KviCString & szPlainText);
00060 };
00061 
00062 class KviRijndael128HexEngine : public KviRijndaelEngine
00063 {
00064         Q_OBJECT
00065 public:
00066         KviRijndael128HexEngine() : KviRijndaelEngine() {};
00067         virtual ~KviRijndael128HexEngine(){};
00068 protected:
00069         virtual int getKeyLen(){ return CryptoPP::AES::MIN_KEYLENGTH; };
00070         virtual int getEncoding(){ return KVI_RIJNDAEL_HEX; };
00071 };
00072 
00073 class KviRijndael192HexEngine : public KviRijndaelEngine
00074 {
00075         Q_OBJECT
00076 public:
00077         KviRijndael192HexEngine() : KviRijndaelEngine() {};
00078         virtual ~KviRijndael192HexEngine(){};
00079 protected:
00080         virtual int getKeyLen(){ return (CryptoPP::AES::MIN_KEYLENGTH + CryptoPP::AES::KEYLENGTH_MULTIPLE); };
00081         virtual int getEncoding() { return KVI_RIJNDAEL_HEX; };
00082 };
00083 
00084 class KviRijndael256HexEngine : public KviRijndaelEngine

00086         Q_OBJECT

00089         virtual ~KviRijndael256HexEngine(){};
00090 protected:

00093 };
00094

00100         virtual ~KviRijndael128Base64Engine(){};
00101 protected:

00112 protected:

00128 // Blowfish (named »Mircryption« to be a real drop in replacement, hopefully)
00129 class KviMircryptionEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00130 {
00131         Q_OBJECT
00132 public:
00133         KviMircryptionEngine();
00134         ~KviMircryptionEngine();
00135         
00136         virtual bool init(const char * pcEncKey, int iEncKeyLen, const char * pcDecKey, int iDecKeyLen);
00137         virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * pcPlainText, KviCString & szOutBuffer);
00138         virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * pcInBuffer, KviCString & szPlainText);
00139 private:
00140         std::string m_szEncKey;
00141         std::string m_szDecKey;
00142         bool m_bEncryptCBC;
00143         bool m_bDecryptCBC;
00144 };
